programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent young man is gunned down in the street, the team works to bring in the suspected culprit, but the case is more complex than it appears; the grief-stricken father is determined to do his own undercover work.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After a series of deadly ambushes, the team goes under cover to bring down a dangerous new drug dealer who is determined to push out the competition; Ruzek's informant proves to be a loose cannon, which could upset the whole operation.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek and Atwater are tasked with making an arrest after a high-profile shooting; the situation becomes complicated when it's clear someone doesn't want them to make it back to the station.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a local business owner is gunned down in his shop, it becomes personal for Atwater, who patrolled the neighborhood as a young cop; Dep. Supt. Samantha Miller comes to Voight with a special request about Andre Cooper.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek's father, Bob, goes missing, and the team races to find him before it's too late.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A wellness check on a family reveals signs of foul play, and Detective Upton is determined to find the parents and young daughter; as she delves further into the troubled family dynamics, she reflects on her own childhood trauma.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick learns murdered Sylvie was involved in a phone dating line that fronted for a gambling operation.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick uncovers a government embezzling scheme linked to the apparent suicide of an employee.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick and Sylvie (Rob Stewart, Carolyn Dunn) uncover the murder of a teenage runaway who was the victim of a life insurance scam.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick and Sylvie search for the truth behind the murder of a teenage runaway who was used as a decoy in a life insurance scam.

programme.title: Xploration Animal Science
programme.desc: Primates: chimpanzees; spider monkeys; howler monkeys.

programme.title: Xploration Animal Science
programme.desc: Sharks use electro-sensors to detect prey; skunks' stinky defense mechanism; zebras vs. horses.

programme.desc: Researchers at the University of Texas look for ways to control invasive fire ant populations; ant societies; pollinators; mosquitoes.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Insect fossils dating back 45 million years; the geology of the park; wild huckleberries; citizen science expedition.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Nature can sometimes be the best classroom; sea grass in Key Largo; aquatic insects; camera traps; an urban citizen science project.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Science helps people prepare for natural disasters: simulating a category 5 hurricane; avalanche safety; studying floods; designing buildings to hold up against earthquakes.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Mercenaries storm the estate in order to find out the true identity of the White Knight, Robin's muse and literary hero; Rick and TC help one of Rick's employees when his car is stolen; Higgins finally answers about becoming Magnum's partner.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: Katsumoto suspects that one of his fellow cops is dirty and has stolen evidence, so he begrudgingly asks Magnum and Higgins for help; Rick and TC help football player Aaron Donald when the tablet containing his playbook is stolen.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: On Halloween, Magnum and Jin search for a skip tracer at a Halloween bash, while Katsumoto tracks an escaped killer who is headed to that same party; Higgins and Rick must spend the night at an allegedly haunted house to debunk it.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: Magnum must help his defense attorney girlfriend when she realizes a client she successfully defended in a murder trial is actually guilty; TC confronts Kamekona about stealing his helicopter business.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.sub-title: The Man in the Secret Room
programme.desc: Magnum investigates the death of a hotel guest who was thrown from her room's balcony while working on a secret investigation of her own; Icepick is released from jail and is trying to keep a secret from Rick.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins' new partnership is tested when they disagree about being hired by a woman who wants them to recover her $3 million in stolen drug money to save her husband's life.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: A guilt-ridden Magnum follows the clues his private investigator friend left behind when he was shot while working a case Thomas passed onto him; TC helps Kumu lead a protest against construction on a Hawaiian sacred site.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum, flooded with memories of his tour in Afghanistan, helps his fallen friend's brother search for a now-grown Afghan boy who may have been a victim of trafficking.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: Magnum is called up from the reserves for a top-secret mission, but his friends are stunned when they learn that the mission is a lie and Magnum has been set up.

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Fever and Dream complete their season series with this contest in the Hoosier State. Atlanta grabbed a 2-1 advantage in the yearly set with a 77-58 victory over Indiana on June 10. Brionna Jones (ATL) set a season high with 21 points in that win.
